en.title: **Frontend ** Engineer
en.text:
As a key member of the development team, I have led the creation and optimization of web applications by focusing on the following areas:

  • Developing reusable React.js components to ensure easy integration into future projects and enhance scalability.
  • Creating and maintaining complex web forms with robust validation and error handling, improving data accuracy and user input management.
  • Building secure and scalable APIs with Node.js to optimize data flow and enhance overall system efficiency.
  • Working in an agile environment with Scrum methodology to ensure timely project delivery, iterative improvements, and efficient resource allocation.
  • Collaborating closely with clients to understand their website and application requirements, developing customized strategies that increased project efficiency by 20% and aligned development with business goals.
  • Enhancing the performance and scalability of web applications through efficient state management with Redux and React Hooks.
  • Optimizing database interactions and queries to improve application speed and reduce load times, ensuring a smooth user experience.

By focusing on efficiency, scalability, and seamless user experiences, I ensure that the products we build meet both client and business objectives while adhering to best practices in software development.

es.title: Ingeniero **Full-Stack**
es.text: Participé en la mejora del sitio web de Coursera al implementar nuevas funcionalidades y optimizar la experiencia del usuario, utilizando tecnologías de frontend y backend para asegurar un funcionamiento sin problemas.

fr.title: Ingénieur **Full-Stack**
fr.text: J'ai contribué à l'amélioration du site Web de Coursera en ajoutant de nouvelles fonctionnalités et en optimisant l'expérience utilisateur, en utilisant des technologies frontend et backend pour garantir un fonctionnement fluide.

ko.title: **풀스택** 엔지니어
ko.text: Coursera 웹사이트를 개선하기 위해 새로운 기능을 추가하고 사용자 경험을 최적화했습니다. 원활한 기능을 보장하기 위해 프론트엔드와 백엔드 기술을 모두 활용했습니다.

en.title: **Frontend ** Engineer
en.text:
Leading a team of developers to design and implement frontend solutions for innovative web applications, with a focus on:

  • Creating responsive, user-centered web applications using HTML, CSS, TypeScript, JavaScript, and React.
  • Implementing RESTful APIs to efficiently query data from external product databases.
  • Developing dynamic UI components using React, Redux, and Hooks to ensure seamless user experiences and optimized rendering.
  • Leveraging container technologies such as Docker to streamline and optimize deployment processes.
  • Designing and maintaining complex web forms with robust validation and error handling to ensure data accuracy and manage user input effectively.
  • Utilizing TypeScript to enhance code scalability, maintainability, and type safety, ensuring higher quality code and fewer runtime errors.
  • Integrating TypeScript with React and Redux for better state management and a more structured, type-safe codebase.

Together, we ensure that the applications we build remain efficient, scalable, and easy to maintain while delivering exceptional user experiences.

es.title: Desarrollador **Backend Senior**
es.text:
Liderando un equipo de desarrolladores para diseñar e implementar soluciones backend para los servicios de Apple, con enfoque en:

  • Seguridad
  • Escalabilidad para manejar millones de usuarios a nivel global
  • Desarrollar APIs RESTful
  • Optimizar el rendimiento de bases de datos con PostgreSQL
  • Construcción de servicios con Swift, PHP y GraphQL

Juntos, aseguramos que la infraestructura backend de Apple se mantenga robusta y eficiente.

fr.title: Développeur **Backend Senior**
fr.text:
Dirigeant une équipe de développeurs pour concevoir et mettre en œuvre des solutions backend pour les services d'Apple, en se concentrant sur:

  • Sécurité
  • Scalabilité pour gérer des millions d'utilisateurs dans le monde
  • Développement d'APIs RESTful
  • Optimisation des performances des bases de données avec PostgreSQL
  • Création de services avec Swift, PHP et GraphQL

Ensemble, nous assurons que l'infrastructure backend d'Apple reste robuste et efficace.

ko.title: **수석 백엔드** 개발자
ko.text:
Apple 서비스의 백엔드 솔루션을 설계하고 구현하는 개발 팀을 이끌며, 다음에 중점을 둡니다:

  • 보안
  • 수백만 명의 사용자를 처리할 수 있는 확장성
  • RESTful API 개발
  • PostgreSQL로 데이터베이스 성능 최적화
  • Swift, PHP, GraphQL로 서비스 구축

우리는 함께 Apple의 백엔드 인프라가 견고하고 효율적으로 유지되도록 보장합니다.

en.title: **IT Administrator** Intern
en.text: Contributed to the development of robust backend systems for Adobe Creative Cloud, integrating third-party services and improving data processing efficiency through cloud functions.

es.title: Ingeniero **Backend**
es.text: Contribuí al desarrollo de sistemas backend robustos para Adobe Creative Cloud, integrando servicios de terceros y mejorando la eficiencia en el procesamiento de datos mediante funciones en la nube.

fr.title: Ingénieur **Backend**
fr.text: J'ai contribué au développement de systèmes backend solides pour Adobe Creative Cloud, intégrant des services tiers et améliorant l'efficacité du traitement des données grâce aux fonctions cloud.

ko.title: **백엔드** 엔지니어
ko.text: Adobe Creative Cloud를 위한 강력한 백엔드 시스템 개발에 기여하였으며, 타사 서비스 통합과 클라우드 기능을 통해 데이터 처리 효율성을 향상시켰습니다.
